title: taruvAi kalai
sahitya:
taruvAi kalai varamE Om sarasvati dhavaLAmbari tAyE pavaLa vAi malarndu


anupallavi

  uruvAi ulaginil aruvAi uLam isai guruvAi arivinil varuvAi pUraNi jaya nAraNiyE


caraNam    vEdavyAsar kALidAsan vAlmIki kamban vIru mighunda vAkkum Aru pOla naDaiyum
kAdalum vIramum karuNaiyum yOgamum kalanda kavithaiyAlE kAlattai venriDat-
